results.title: Metformin promotes tau aggregation and exacerbates abnormal behavior in a mouse model of tauopathy
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ promotes @DISEASE_Alzheimer's_disease_without_Neurofibrillary_tangles @DISEASE_MESH:C536599 @@@tau aggregation@@@ and exacerbates abnormal behavior in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Tauopathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D024801 @@@tauopathy@@@

citations.NLM: Barini E, Antico O, Zhao Y, Asta F, Tucci V, Catelani T, Marotta R, Xu H, Gasparini L. Metformin promotes tau aggregation and exacerbates abnormal behavior in a mouse model of tauopathy Mol Neurodegener. 2016 Feb 9;11():16. PMID: 26858121
citations.BibTeX: @article{26858121, title={Metformin promotes tau aggregation and exacerbates abnormal behavior in a mouse model of tauopathy}, author={Barini E and Antico O and Zhao Y and Asta F and Tucci V and Catelani T and Marotta R and Xu H and Gasparini L}, journal={Mol Neurodegener}, volume={11}, pages={16}}

results.title: Metformin Therapy Aggravates Neurodegenerative Processes in ApoE-/- Mice.
results.text_hl: Due to the controversial data on the neuroprotective properties of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, we treated @GENE_APOE @GENE_11816 @@@Apolipoprotein E@@@ deficient (ApoE- /-) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Tauopathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D024801 @@@tauopathy@@@, with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for 18 weeks.

citations.NLM: Kuhla A, Brichmann E, Rühlmann C, Thiele R, Meuth L, Vollmar B. Metformin Therapy Aggravates Neurodegenerative Processes in ApoE-/- Mice. J Alzheimers Dis. 2019;68(4):1415-1427. PMID: 30909226
citations.BibTeX: @article{30909226, title={Metformin Therapy Aggravates Neurodegenerative Processes in ApoE-/- Mice.}, author={Kuhla A and Brichmann E and Rühlmann C and Thiele R and Meuth L and Vollmar B}, journal={J Alzheimers Dis}, volume={68}, number={4}, pages={1415-1427}}

results.title: Metformin attenuates diabetes-induced tau hyperphosphorylation in vitro and in vivo by enhancing autophagic clearance.
results.text_hl: These data show that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may reduce @<m>DISEASE_Tauopathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D024801 @@@tauopathy@@@ and improve @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairment@@@ in db/db @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ by modulating autophagy through the AMPK dependent pathway.

citations.NLM: Chen JL, Luo C, Pu D, Zhang GQ, Zhao YX, Sun Y, Zhao KX, Liao ZY, Lv AK, Zhu SY, Zhou J, Xiao Q. Metformin attenuates diabetes-induced tau hyperphosphorylation in vitro and in vivo by enhancing autophagic clearance. Exp Neurol. 2019 Jan;311():44-56. PMID: 30219731
citations.BibTeX: @article{30219731, title={Metformin attenuates diabetes-induced tau hyperphosphorylation in vitro and in vivo by enhancing autophagic clearance.}, author={Chen JL and Luo C and Pu D and Zhang GQ and Zhao YX and Sun Y and Zhao KX and Liao ZY and Lv AK and Zhu SY and Zhou J and Xiao Q}, journal={Exp Neurol}, volume={311}, pages={44-56}}

results.title: Hydralazine induces stress resistance and extends C. elegans lifespan by activating the NRF2/SKN-1 signalling pathway
results.text_hl: We demonstrate that @CHEMICAL_Hydralazine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006830 @@@hydralazine@@@ extends healthy lifespan (~25%) in wild type and @<m>DISEASE_Tauopathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D024801 @@@tauopathy@@@ model @SPECIES_328850 @@@C. elegans@@@ at least as effectively as other anti-aging compounds, such as @CHEMICAL_Curcumin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003474 @@@curcumin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Dehghan E, Zhang Y, Saremi B, Yadavali S, Hakimi A, Dehghani M, Goodarzi M, Tu X, Robertson S, Lin R, Chudhuri A, Mirzaei H. Hydralazine induces stress resistance and extends C. elegans lifespan by activating the NRF2/SKN-1 signalling pathway Nat Commun. 2017 Dec 20;8(1):2223. PMID: 29263362
